website_summaries.verdict: The Merrell Hut Moc is not your usual footwear. Experience a slipper on a shoe with this kind of Merrell slip-on. It is a staple of lightweight and comfy feel. Whether for casual walking or partying, it is versatile to jazz up several OOTDs. Just a note, it may not provide enough traction that others need.
pros: The Merrell Hut Moc has a cute and eye-appealing design that is appreciated by several customers
A lot of users have testified that this kind of Merrell sneakers is remarkably lightweight
With a collapsible heel, it allows easy on and off that makes it an excellent substitute to slippers, according to many reviews
Plenty of wearers have confirmed that the low-top Merrell Hut Moc delivers on-feet comfort
This slip-on sneaker is available in beautiful colorways that are admired by several purchasers
Most reviewers have shared that it fits true to size
The Hut Moc by Merrell provides adequate heel support, according to a few
It gives a light foamy and soft feel, as per a couple of reviews
The Hut Moc is among the affordable Merrell shoes
cons: Some reviewers have complained that the Merrell Hut Moc is slippery to walk on hardwood floors
A few have muttered about the shoe’s thin cushioning
The Merrell Hut Moc fits tight around the toe area, which some users have complained against

customer_reviews.title: Slick Slick Soles
customer_reviews.text: These mocs look and fit great. But I had to return them because for some reason they put a felt material on the bottoms. Was slicker than socks on my hard wood floors. Cant imagine wearing these down the stairs. I love the look and colors. I have owned at least 20 pairs of the jungle and winter mocs. They are the main shoes that I wear and wanted a replacement for the old wore out Merrell Alpine quilted mocs that I had. Unfortunately these did not make the grade.
customer_reviews.author: Travis M.

customer_reviews.title: Really tight across top
customer_reviews.text: Length and width were fine but way, way too tight across top of foot. Only someone with feet as flat as a duck would be comfortable in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Firefox23508

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected from Merrell
customer_reviews.text: I saw these in an outfitters in Nashville, on clearance, but they did not have my size..I was.dissappoonted as they looked amazing and comfortable. I ignored the negative reviews as the price was right. After wearing them, the price was wrong! Somehow they are very uncomfortable and actully hurt my feet every time I wear them..I feel like it's Merrels take of the Nothface slippers. I would return them but I have worn them for about 16 hours hoping they would break-in or more better to my feel. I do not reccomended this shoe. Merrell has many other great shows so keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Blev

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea for House Shoes
customer_reviews.text: For decades I wore LL Bean mocassin slippers around the house. The soles get very slick over time and that recently caused me to slip and fall down a few carpeted stairs. After that painful experience, I searched for a soled slipper and didn't find what I was looking for. These are the answer. Lightweight and comfortable to wear and not to warm in the house, yet a trip down the driveway to take out the trash is no problem. It's nice to come down those stairs with confidence again!
customer_reviews.author: tivadoc

customer_reviews.title: Red is more maroon
customer_reviews.text: Love them, will be getting a black pair. I was worried about fit, I usually run about 10 1/2 in sneakers. I got the 11 and believe that is the right size for me. They are wide at the toe, which I like, narrower toward the heal. Not a 5 star review due to the color NOT being red. They call this color Bassanova? Who the heck knows what that color is? Just say maroon, or crimson for petes sake.
customer_reviews.author: William J Stratman

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but runs very small.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice - what it looked like it would feel... Many reviews said to size up and I'm usually a 10.5/11 so I ordered 11. Too small. Reordered a 12 and they fit great. I've never worn a 12 in my life. For what its worth...
customer_reviews.author: G. R. Surprenant

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but Consider a Size Up
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit, light weight hut mocs. They were a little slippery when first new, but after short wearing period slipperiness wore off quickly. I'd advise buying a size up though. I wear 10.5, but a size eleven might be too small/snug for a 11 sized foot.
customer_reviews.author: dakotamoviefan

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe ever for me!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes may be some of the most comfortable I have worn. I really like them. Exactly what I wanted and better. Very well sewn and constructed, good support, wonderful footbed and outer sole. Love the shape for my toes! They are pricey but since they are soo comfortable, my wallet only hurts a little. Will watch for lower pricing and buy more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Greybeard

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Do not like the cloth heel strap. Because I wear corrective insoles the back of the shoe consistently slides under my heels. More like a clog than a moc. It took a few hours for this problem to present itself. I can't wear these shoes. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Billings

customer_reviews.title: Merrell intentions are good but not this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I used to get Merrell shoes only...and many of them. They, in my opinion are making them very inexpensive and it feels like it. These shoes are not really that good compared to others currently on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Indy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and in original pkg.
customer_reviews.text: I have happy feet walking about during covid-19. Arrived in a timely manner with the added bonus of a ram decal from Back Country. New condition with all the tags original box etc. I will definitely make future purchases via this seller.
customer_reviews.author: andrea hill

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what they are
customer_reviews.text: $85 is WAY TOO MUCH for this slipper. I would be happy with it at half that price, but this clearly does not have the structure, comfort, complexity or durability of a sneaker- which is what it's price tag suggests. Find them on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Carbone

customer_reviews.title: I found them small
customer_reviews.text: Fit is small. I really liked them but my regular size was too tight. Not willing to experiment via Amazon for correct size.
customer_reviews.author: 2ballcane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect indoor/outdoor slipper
customer_reviews.text: Merrell just makes great shoes, and these are not exception. They are toasty without getting hot and feel like there is some ventilation. They fit great, and I love that you can either go full slipper or clogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Up To Merrill Standards
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a low quality item compared to every other item I’ve purchased from Merrill. No insole and just feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Pokin’ Fun

customer_reviews.title: Order a bigger size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size up and that was close to right but the shoe was tight on my foot. Not wide enough and the sole does not provide good traction. Guess I will keep them and hope they stretch out some and traction improves.
customer_reviews.author: Leon E. Faris

customer_reviews.title: Built well except . . .
customer_reviews.text: Well built, however my toe nails (trimmed) catch on the fabric seams with each step I take. Really don’t like that feel.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: The mocs ran smaller and tighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: They were a smaller and more narrow than I anticipated. They also weren't that comfortable. I returned them with no issues from the seller, so I have no complaints there, I just don't think these shoes are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear these around the house and and the yard and I am extremely happy with them. Very lightweight, extremely comfortable and look great too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ghaemi

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, super comfortable shoes that fit true to my size. Like a glove. Love them. Why not 5 stars? They are rather slippery on smooth surfaces like hardwood floors. That will probably wear off once I use them for a while. That said, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ralf Tomandl

customer_reviews.title: They hurt me as soon as I tried them on
customer_reviews.text: Just received the shoes and I could not wear them for 30 seconds, the insole has a sharp edge that hurts you dramatically. I don’t understand how they can manufacture such an uncomfortable shoe, I’m sending them back right away
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit. Almost too small, but comfy still.
customer_reviews.text: I am between a 12&13 and the size 13 shoes I ordered fit closer to a 12. My toes touch the front of the shoe. The shoes are comfy but have interesting ridges in the soles. Must wear socks. Blisters would definitely happen on your heels without socks.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Traeger

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: For as expensive as these were, I was expecting more comfort or support. None! You can feel the lumps on the sole of the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Carey the great

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: I've been look for a durable house shoe, that's warm but does not make your feet sweat; and that's comfortable and looks good. I found it in these shoes. Merrell has the same great fit ... as always.
customer_reviews.author: Bob In VA

customer_reviews.title: Very Confy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes came as advertised. Very confortable and the excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Wills

customer_reviews.title: Supper comfortable- easy on & off
customer_reviews.text: This was my 3rd pair . They are comfortable house , automobile, shopping and loafing shoes , not for rugged terrain . Easy on and off , lightweight and looks good with casual dress . Didn’t like some of the color combos for some of the men’s shoes but that’s just Personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: John Englehart

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, great for indoors, size runs pretty close to norm, will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Dave Chester

customer_reviews.title: Slippery when dry and wet
customer_reviews.text: Very slippery and stiff soles. The shoes look nice but I would only recommend them for carpeted floors. No traction onnhardwoods or tile.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Nunes

customer_reviews.title: Hut Moc
customer_reviews.text: My only note is that I have other Merrill shoes and wear a 10 but the Hut Moc Loafers feel a half size smaller. Overall very pleased and will order another pair for thicker socks for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Chew

customer_reviews.title: very light weight
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight great slippers large toe box. They feel very comfortable. I ware them every day in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: william wuisman

customer_reviews.title: A perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: They fit like a glove and super light... can’t wait to take these bad boys backpacking
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Versatility.
customer_reviews.text: They feel like slippers, and are as comfortable as running shoes. I even bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Shocking
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit, but the sole material build up static electricity and I constantly get shocked.
customer_reviews.author: D. Zombro

customer_reviews.title: Double check price before ordering.
customer_reviews.text: We found the product $40 cheaper! Had no problem with anything else.
customer_reviews.author: CFamily

customer_reviews.title: Like the Look, and the Fit
customer_reviews.text: These are true to size, and I really like the look. I've had many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: John Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: Slip on to comfort!
customer_reviews.text: This is now my new go to casual shoe for around the house chores or a quick back and forth to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love Them
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are awesome. Great fit, look great and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: David Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect no frills, well made house shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, light weight, not lined like a plush house shoe but wasn’t looking for that.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

product_meta.title: Merrell womens J90731 Hut Moc
product_meta.description: Super-light, ultra-comfy, Hut Moc features an ultra-lightweight EVA outsole and a quilted upper, so you can enjoy adventures well beyond the warming hut. FEATURES Quilted Nylon upper Lightweight EVA outsole Weight: 0lb 12oz / 348g
